mapper.update: update party..tb_watchvideolog set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watch_second = #{watchSecond,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
